hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL regime (regime confidence > 70%) with BTC price breaking above its 20-day Bollinger Band upper band AND 24h volume exceeding 30-day average by 40%, a long position will generate alpha over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regime transitions with volume confirmation signal institutional accumulation. The Bollinger Band breakout in neutral regimes often precedes sustained moves as trapped liquidity gets released. Volume spike filters out false breakouts.
entry_conditions: Regime shifts from NEUTRAL to BULL (confidence > 70%)
BTC closes above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band (2 std dev)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry OR regime shifts back to NEUTRAL
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 8% loss from entry OR BTC closes below 10-day moving average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 45% of such signals result in immediate mean reversion (price returns below breakout level within 3 days) OR average 5-day return < 3% after transaction costs.
